name: Togi
description:
5th GMTK Game Jam entry! Theme: Joined Together. 

Rotate your line around and "Join" together with some blocks that increase your length. This makes the game harder, but the longer you are when you get to the finish line, the more points you get. Also, the quicker you do the more points you get. If you collide with walls, you get shorter until you die. 

Have fun!
